techmeme.title: OpenAI says GPT-5 is its first "unified" AI model and combines the reasoning abilities of its o-series of models with the fast responses of its GPT series (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
OpenAI launches a research preview of four preset personalities for ChatGPT users to better tailor their interactions: Cynic, Robot, Listener, and Nerd (Rachel Metz/Bloomberg)
OpenAI releases GPT-5, its new flagship model, to all of its ChatGPT users and developers, available in three flavors via the API (Alex Heath/The Verge)
A livestream of OpenAI's GPT-5 announcement (OpenAI on YouTube)
Source: OpenAI awards bonuses to ~1,000 research and engineering employees, or ~30% of its staff, ranging from several hundred thousand to millions of dollars (Stephanie Palazzolo/The Information)
